titles.title: Empowering Women in Small Business Act
Empowering Women in Small Business Act
A bill to amend the Small Business Act relating to small business concerns owned and controlled by women, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Empowering Women in Small Business Act
This bill permits certain women-owned small businesses to retain for seven years their certification under the Small Business Administration's Women-Owned Small Business (WOSB) Federal Contracting program even if the ownership interests in the small business are held by a licensed small business investment company that would otherwise reduce the ownership percentage below the threshold required for participation in the WOSB program.
